effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Hits 2–5 times in one turn. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavor_text.black-white: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.
